definitions: the action of estimating or concluding something by assuming that existing trends will continue or a current method will remain applicable

examples.text: caution is advised in the interpretation and extrapolation of results
the figure is an extrapolation from prior data

shortDefinitions: action of estimating or concluding something by assuming that existing trends will continue or current method will remain applicable

definitions: the extension of a graph, curve, or range of values by inferring unknown values from trends in the known data

examples.text: extrapolation of the logarithmic curve yielded an estimate of 66 species

shortDefinitions: extension of graph, curve, or range of values by inferring unknown values from trends in known data
